Name: Irish Coffee 'Martini'
Ingredients: 15 ml Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar to 1 water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Garnish with 3 coffee beans floated in a petal formation in the centre of the cocktail's foamy head.
Review: Forget sipping warm java through a cold head of cream. This 'Martini' version of the classic Irish Coffee offers all the flavour without the moustache.
History: Created in 2003 by yours truly in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Irish Coffee 'Martini' contains 213 calories
